alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Leon; Limestone; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Freestone, north central Leon, Henderson, northern Limestone, northwestern Anderson and eastern Navarro Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gun Barrel City to Mart. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Palestine, Athens, Mexia, Gun Barrel City, Groesbeck, Teague, Fairfield, Mabank, Chandler, Malakoff, Tool, Buffalo, Kerens, Frankston, Wortham, Brownsboro, Eustace, Berryville and Coolidge. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 179 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Leon; Limestone; Navarro
